# Preface {.unnumbered}

Cellestial is a single-cell and spatial biology data visualization library.
It produces publication-quality figures through a ggplot2-like API of Lets-Plot and provides extensive customization options and creates interactive figures for exploration.

Install Cellestial with:
```shell
pip install cellestial
```
